articles.title: Indonesian blockbuster IPO to set tone for Southeast Asia tech sector - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: The first listing of a multibillion-dollar Southeast Asian tech company in Indonesia on Friday (Aug 6) will set the benchmark for IPO hopefuls in a region where global investors are chasing fast growing e-commerce markets.
